Token.Abstract: The PFLogInViewControllerDelegate protocol defines methods a delegate of a PFSignUpViewController should implement. All methods of this protocol are optional.
Sent to the delegate to determine whether the sign up request should be submitted to the server.

Parameter.Name: signUpController
Parameter.Abstract: The signup view controller that is requesting the data.

Parameter.Name: info
Parameter.Abstract: An NSDictionary instance which contains all sign up information that the user entered.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A BOOL indicating whether the sign up should proceed.

Token.Abstract: Sent to the delegate when a PFUser is signed up.

Parameter.Name: signUpController
Parameter.Abstract: The signup view controller where signup finished.

Parameter.Name: user
Parameter.Abstract: PFUser object that is a result of the sign up.

Token.Abstract: Sent to the delegate when the sign up attempt fails.

Parameter.Name: signUpController
Parameter.Abstract: The signup view controller where signup failed.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: NSError object representing the error that occured.

Token.Abstract: Sent to the delegate when the sign up screen is cancelled.

Parameter.Name: signUpController
Parameter.Abstract: The signup view controller where signup was cancelled.
